attributes.action: Recommend that Captain Tom should receive a knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
Captain Tom Moore, the war veteran who has been walking laps of his 25m garden to raise £1,000 for the NHS by his 100th birthday, is set to raise £30,000,000 by that date on 30th April 2020. 
He has also become the oldest person ever to score a number one single in the UK.
attributes.background: Recommend that Captain Tom Moore should receive a knighthood

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
